com.safety4kids.game.Entities

Class MainPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.safety4kids.game.Entities.MainPlayer

  • public class MainPlayer
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    This class represents the MainPlayer, it creates and instantiates the location of the player, the box2d body, the sprites, and the animation for them. It is the control center for the main player. Sprite resources are original from Erfan.Y and Bill.B

    Course Info:

    ICS4UO with V. Krasteva
    Author:
    Erfan Yeganehfar, Bill Bai Ms. Krasteva

      Creates the Box2d Fixture and Body for the player, assigns the location, the shape, and the type of Body.

      Returns the Box2D body position in the Box2D world

      gets the timers value

      Gets the box 2ds body position
      void jump()
      Applies an impulse to the player from the y coordinate allowing it to simulate jumping if the current state was not jumping/falling before

      Update used to update the position of the hazard as well as the current animation
